job description:
Data Analyst Contractor Job Description

Data/Research Analyst - San Francisco (HQ)
3 Months
Start Date: July 2018



About the Role:

We are seeking candidates who demonstrate thorough research abilities, air-tight organization, and attention to detail for a comprehensive review of customer and prospect data. Analysts can expect exposure to a variety of business functions.

You Will:
  • Conduct in-depth market research on global Accounts and Companies using valid industry sources
  • Conduct strategic analysis on Accounts to evaluate propensity to buy and sales engagement
  • Conduct in-depth analysis on the deal pipeline to look categorize accounts into high-touch and low-touch
  • Submit and track territory operations cases using an in-house custom tool.
  • Follow-up and ensure resolution to each territory operations case.
  • Run reports and dashboards to highlight Account ownership changes.
Required Skills:
  • Rigorous attention to detail
  • 1+ years of Salesforce and/or Excel experience (Reports, Dashboards, Analytics)
  • Strong communication skills, both verbal and written
  • Quick learner
  • Highly organized
  • Strong problem solving skills
  • Ability to multi-task while managing deadlines, to perform well under pressure and to work independently and as a part of a team
  • Analytically inclined
Desired Skills:
  • Bachelor's Degree
1+ years of experience with data cleansing or database management
